subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Alexei Cherepanov, the 19-year-old Rangers draft pick who died after collapsing in a game, was playing illegally for his Russian club, a top military officer said. Cherepanov’s death Oct. 13 prompted outrage among lawmakers and Russian sports officials, with many calling for an investigation into the cause of the heart problems that led to his death at a Continental Hockey League game. Col. Vladimir Karpenko, a spokesman for the commander of Russia’s Railway Troops, said on the state-run First Channel that Cherepanov should have been serving his mandatory military service. ¶Patrick Kane had a goal and an assist as the host Chicago Blackhawks beat the Dallas Stars, 5-2. blackhawks (AP).
